content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the web_search command to find the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The command returned a list of websites with travel information, including US News Travel, Time Out, and Lonely Planet. These websites provided a variety of options for things to do and see in each location, such as wandering around Boston Common and the Public Garden, catching a concert at the Leader Bank Pavilion, and visiting the Isabella Stewart Gardener museum.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.lonelyplanet.com", "question": "What are the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a travel website featuring articles on various destinations and travel-related topics, including activities, accommodations, and practicalities. Boston, Porto, and Switzerland are among the destinations featured, but there is no specific information on the best attractions or activities in these places.\n\nLinks: ['Check out our trending guides (https://shop.lonelyplanet.com/collections/trending-destinations)', ' (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/)', 'Sign In (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/api/auth/login)', ' Saved lists (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile)', ' eLibrary (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile/library)']", type='action_result')]
"""
